programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1007
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2220
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep96
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4920
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: The Three Swordsmen
programme.desc: Knife, Jian and Sam are three famous swordsmen. Knife works for the Emperor and when Sam is framed for murdering the Empress, Knife gets involved. Sam manages to find the murderer but is injured in the process. This however did not stop him fighting Jian for the top spot in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan, actor Cheung Chau Wan, gynecologist Fu Mo Sum, feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung, and dance coach Charlie Lam - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu, who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin Bei Xing before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmers role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clans disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score The Proud One. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clans leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dongs songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: A duel has been arranged at the Forbidden City between two formidable swordsmen of the martial world, Ye Gu Cheng and Xi Men Chui Xue. Lu Xiao Feng smells something fishy about the duel as the two swordsmen never met and do not have any conflicts. He decides to investigate more with Hua Man Lou, and eventually uncovers some hidden conspiracies

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - Black Leopard. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of Black Leopard, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the familys young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huos stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chiefs illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his fathers death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Return Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: One of Shaw Studios highest grossing movies ever, this is the story of Li Chin Huan, the renowned, charming and sentimental swordsman who must fight many opponents, including an evil Clan Chief, for a place in the martial arts world.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Dukes daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: Hagola Ep59
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep60
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep61
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep62
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Hagola Ep63
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep24
programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep25

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: What if, in the wake of more than a decade of devastating weather events, we finally found a way to control Mother Nature and the destruction her tirades entail? When catastrophic climate change endangers Earths very survival, world governments unite and create Project Dutch Boy: a global net of satellites surrounding the planet that are armed with geo-engineering technologies designed to stave off the natural disasters. After successfully protecting the planet for two years, something is starting to go wrong. Two estranged brothers (Gerard Butler, Jim Sturgess) are tasked with solving the programs malfunction before a worldwide geostorm can engulf the planet.

programme.desc: Made In America - Each chef must select two different boxes, each representing a state and its local ingredients, and then create one inventive fusion dish.

programme.title: Next Level Chef S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Finale - In the second half of the finale, the final three chefs must create one dish on each level of the kitchen in just 90 minutes. It is up to the chefs to determine how much time they use on the bottom and middle levels, which will determine how much time they have to make their final dish on the top level. Eighteen chefs began the journey, three will cook in the finale, and only one will win the one-year mentorship, $250,000 and the title of Next Level Chef.

programme.desc: An actress's nightmare about killing her ex-boyfriend somehow becomes a reality.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: A retired soldier takes on a military supercomputer that has run amok.

programme.title: Super Eruption
programme.desc: Super Eruption is a non-stop thrill ride - the story of two people who come together to put a stop to one of the greatest natural disasters to ever threaten humanity

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Asteroid: Final Impact
programme.desc: Scientist Steve Thomas must risk his reputation, career, and life in order to save mankind from a huge asteroid headed straight for Earth

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Chappie tells the story of a robot imbued with artificial intelligence who is stolen by two local gangsters who want to use him for their own nefarious purposes.

programme.title: One Point O
programme.desc: After receiving mysterious empty packages inside his apartment, a young computer-programmer begins a personal investigation into their origins.

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A schoolgirl's accusation of sexual assault triggers a scandal in a wealthy Florida yachting enclave.

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Clive Owen and Naomi Watts star in an adrenaline-pumping, action-packed thrill ride about a man determined to deliver justice to a corrupt international arms-dealing ringthat funds worldwide genocide and terrorism...no matter the cost!

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: A newly-single yuppie's new roommate acquires more than just a room. Stylish, adrenaline-laced thriller stars Bridget Fonda and Jennifer Jason Leigh.

programme.title: Welcome To Sudden Death
programme.desc: A former special forces officer working as a security guard battles a group of terrorists after they take hostages inside a basketball arena.

programme.title: Asteroid: Final Impact
programme.desc: Scientist Steve Thomas must risk his reputation, career, and life in order to save mankind from a huge asteroid headed straight for Earth

programme.title: The Ninth Gate

programme.title: Backdraft 2

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Ali

programme.desc: Hunted by a ruthless agent and an army of corrupt cops working for a deadly drug kingpin, Toretto and OConner reunite the gang to pull off one last job - an insane heist worth $100 million!

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep19
programme.desc: 50 million Big Hunks of peanutty nougat are produced every year; watch potato pellets become Smart Fries in just two minutes flat; and see how one million gummy bears are produced every hour.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep20
programme.desc: A mesmerising behind-the-scenes peek into the mega-industrial production lines of food factories, including pretzel nuggets, French fried onions and Italian Brio soda.

programme.title: Pangolins: The World's Most Wanted Animal
programme.desc: Nature documentary following the efforts to save the pangolin, a little-known scaly mammal with an unfortunate tagline - they are the world's most illegally trafficked animals.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Paris - Joanna begins with a trip to Paris. She takes a hot-air balloon ride, visits the fire-damaged Notre-Dame, meets heiress Daphne Guinness, buys a vintage Chanel suit, and meets Ibrahim, refugee turned inner-city beekeeper.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Feel the burn at a state-of-the-art gym that used to be a psychiatric hospital and see a climbing complex that once was a sugar refinery.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep6
programme.desc: USA East - This week Robson's fishing challenge takes him to New York where his opponent is known as the Tony Soprano of fishing.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - A Koala Called Cavendish Ep2
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Cook Islands/ Kki 'Airani Ep6
programme.desc: Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Kakumbi Are Vulnerable Ep4
programme.desc: Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Risk and Reward Ep3
programme.desc: The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park Ep5
programme.desc: In the southern reaches of Africas great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.desc: Travel to the Cook Islands, the destination of choice for 3,000 humpback whales ready to mate and raise their young. Witness giant clams and green turtles thriving in the islands massive coral reef and get a glimpse into our evolutionary past.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi Ep5
programme.desc: Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Ugly Cute Ep5
programme.desc: Not all baby animals are cute. Often, quirky physical traits are evolutionary adaptations that have helped a species survive. Visit four funny-looking youngsters, including a Baird tapir, two baby gelada baboons, an anteater and a Bactrian camel.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Road to Independence Ep4
programme.desc: As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Chobe National Park: Land of Learning Ep6
programme.desc: In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africas most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.desc: Go on a junk-food-fuelled urban holiday with the Street Troop, then watch the Hill Troops invasion of their turf turn sour. Monitor the Sisterhoods plot to kidnap Saras baby before newly minted alpha Loci discovers his old rival is back in town.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spiky and Stinky Ep3
programme.desc: Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favorite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Manzi the Superpack Ep6
programme.desc: Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Baby Animals 2 - Primate Families Ep6
programme.desc: The sprawling primate family includes animals as different as monkeys, lemurs and humans. Follow primate babies to see how they bond with their mothers, learn to socialize, and adapt to an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Berenty Dynasty Ep5
programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the islands forests.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - Clash of the Alphas Ep3
programme.desc: Stand back when a brawl erupts after the Street Troop finds the Hill Troop on their turf. Assess Matnoors poor parenting skills, see alpha wannabe Ajit make his move, then cool off as a heat wave pushes everyone to share the wealth in the forest.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 1 - Spoonbill Soft Shoe Shuffle Ep4
programme.desc: Join the teams scramble to help a trio of distressed baby wallabies and a koala joey whos having seizures. Scale a tree with rescuer Jo to net a wounded lizard, see kookaburra feather-implant surgery, and admire a spoonbills new corrective shoes.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep16
programme.desc: Dew Glue / Dew Believer - When Harpers ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep57
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lord Shark - King Julien's submarine sinks in the ocean; Clover & Sage go on quests to test their patience and rage; Mort leads an escape but a spy is in the midst

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep58
programme.desc: Bad Year Blimp - King Julien and his team ride sharks to an Island; Clover and Sage get a map that leads to the wisdom they seek; Mort hides in Junk Harbor

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep16
programme.desc: Dew Glue / Dew Believer - When Harpers ceramic dragon is smashed, the Dews must find all the pieces. But when a piece ends up missing, the Dews work together to create a new piece, hoping no one will notice. / Dylan goes to great lengths to invite his Dew Drop to his soccer game but, in the process, learns that sometimes believing in something is more powerful than seeing something.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over / Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep3
programme.desc: Defenders Of The Universe - The Castle is attacked by an alien battle cruiser. The new Paladins must form Voltron for the first time in 10,000 years.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep29
programme.desc: Gorgey Girl / A Gran Adventure - Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep29
programme.desc: Jolly Olde England - Wally and Wenda's plan to watch a soccer game in London is interrupted when Odlulu and Fritz use the Key in the Stone to summon a medieval castle in the middle of modern-day England. It's up to the Wanderers to stop King Fritz before his knights turn London upside down!

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secrethe's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep6
programme.desc: Hot Stuff - Big Chris takes the cars to the beach to relax in the heat but he is so busy dealing with the cars he forgets to drink his water. But hang on, who else has drunk it

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock but the damage has been done. Eagle Mama Hen's best friend decides to lend Hen her most prized possession A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep22
programme.desc: That Stinking Feeling / Go for The Gold - When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founders Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep22
programme.desc: The Itch To Switch / Mismatched Socks - When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep17
programme.desc: Tea Times Up / Barks, Baths, And Beyond - When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition theyve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, its up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep22

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep22
programme.desc: That Stinking Feeling / Go for The Gold - When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founders Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep22
programme.desc: The Itch To Switch / Mismatched Socks - When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep5
programme.desc: Spinny Water / Kelp's Song - Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep132
programme.desc: Bubu's Robot - Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Gift Hunt / Paddington's Burns Night Haggis Hunt - Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? // It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis, but will it visit them?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep618
programme.desc: The Fastest of them All - When a greedy queen casts a spell to make a few of our friends go slow, Blaze and AJ must race her for the magical cure

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep712
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Pupmobiles - Mayor Goodway honors the Paw Patrol with the Key to the City. But Sid Swashbuckle and his trusty pirate pup Arrby swipe the key. Ryder calls for an Ultimate Rescue as the pups team up, Police style, to solve the mystery and stop those pesky pirates.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep625
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Opening Ceremonies / Ultimate Rescue: Pups Save the Adventure Bay Games - Marshall leads the pups when an underground fire threatens the Opening Ceremonies in this Ultimate Fire Rescue. // Chase and his police-pups must find the missing medals to save the Adventure Bay Games in this Ultimate Police Rescue.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep602
programme.desc: Ultimate Rescue: Pups Stop a Meltdown - It's a hot day in Adventure Bay and things are melting! The pups will need afire-pup power to cool things down.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep105

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep249
programme.desc: The Powercut - One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep250
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Birthday - Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep251
programme.desc: Sleepover - Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep252
programme.desc: Stars - It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep103

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep418

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep819
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Tournament / Rescue Knights: Pups Save the Baby Dragons - The Paw Patrol helps a Mystery Knight, the Princess in disguise, win a tournament when Claw and Sparks show up and sabotage the event. // The Rescue Knights must save some baby dragons from Claw and reunite them with their mommy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep818
programme.desc: Rescue Knights: Pups Save a Dozing Dragon - When the Duke and Claw use a magic cauldron to put the people of Barkingburg to sleep, their plan backfires when the enchanted fog works on Sparks, it's up to the Paw Patrol to wake up the Dragon along with everyone else in town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep820
programme.desc: Rescue Knight: Pups Save Excalibark - When Chase accidentally pulls the legendary Golden Bone of Excalibark from its stone and becomes the Royal Knight, the Duke and Claw plot to ruin the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo. // Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: NHK World-Japan Special Program
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a wide range of programs from news, current affairs, documentaries, etc. focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 28, Day 15 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Through research on the calls of the Japanese tit, Suzuki Toshitaka has proven that animals other than humans have language capabilities. He talks about pioneering the field of animal linguistics.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We follow Spanish photographer Tina Bague as she captures images of fellow non-Japanese living in Miyama in Kyoto, and Ukrainian Denys Kralikauskas who makes and mends tatami mats in Beppu in Oita.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Evacuee Support As Time Passes
programme.desc: Local foreign residents have been helping people stricken by the Noto Peninsula Earthquake through ongoing support activities, starting with an emergency curry kitchen and meeting changing needs.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Special series of Iwate in June." We show various aspects of Iwate prefecture through "The Golden Hall of Chusonji Temple," "Japan Railway Journal," and other programs.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Through research on the calls of the Japanese tit, Suzuki Toshitaka has proven that animals other than humans have language capabilities. He talks about pioneering the field of animal linguistics.

programme.title: Ramen Japan
programme.desc: Tokushima ramen means tonkotsu! Topped with pork belly, and, of all things, raw egg-enjoy a one-of-a-kind bowl of ramen!

programme.title: On The Wings
programme.desc: Hop on a plane and view Japan from the sky! It's nearly the apex of summer, and we're heading to the nature rich Amami Oshima Island, which recently became a UNESCO World Natural Heritage site.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Evacuee Support As Time Passes
programme.desc: Local foreign residents have been helping people stricken by the Noto Peninsula Earthquake through ongoing support activities, starting with an emergency curry kitchen and meeting changing needs.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Special series of Iwate in June." We show various aspects of Iwate prefecture through "The Golden Hall of Chusonji Temple," "Japan Railway Journal," and other programs.

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: This program gives you comprehensive coverage of events in Japan and Asia. It explains the day's developments and what is behind them.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Oda Yuriko has a disease which affects her muscles. She runs an app that offers fellow wheelchair users information about accessibility in the hopes of creating a world that works for everyone.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Takinogawa River
programme.desc: We travel to a well-known tourist resort just outside of Edo, where day-trippers are enjoying river recreation and forest walks, praying at local shrines, and sitting down for riverside picnics.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A famed former trainer runs a ranch where retired racehorses spend their final days in nature bringing comfort to human visitors. But then an earthquake brings uncertainty to their peaceful lives.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #26 This Japanese omelet is sweet and delicious. / Stack adjectives to get more ways to express your impressions. The key is changing the first "i" of "i"-ending adjectives to "kute."

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Discover how intricate woodcraft traditions evolved by watching a turner and a cooper at work.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Enjoy camping in early summer, Hokkaido's most comfortable season. A cozy campsite in the woods provides the setting for a gorgeous campfire meal and a chance to refresh your mind and body.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.desc: New Alzheimer's disease drugs have been developed in recent years. The key is to start treatment before dementia begins. We introduce new technologies that find early warning signs.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep705
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Fighter Focus: Sean Woodson, My Moment: Miesha Tate, Inside the UFC: UFC Gloves - Despite adversity and the loss of his father at a young age, Sean Woodson forges a successful UFC career. programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA

programme.title: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Czech Round
programme.desc: Highlights 2024 WorldSBK - Czech Round - Autodrom Most first appeared on the WorldSBK calendar in 2021 and has become an instant classic due to its quirky layout leading to incredible late-race fights. Thanks to its attractive event line-up, it is a popular destination for many motor enthusiasts and their families from across Europe. The track was completed in 1983 as a part of restoration of coal mine lands and it became the first permanent motor racing complex in what was then Czechoslovakia. Motorcycle racing has long tradition there, from club trainings to International championships.

programme.title: UFC 304: Edwards vs. Muhammad 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On July 28, the UFC is back Manchester, England for its first visit to the Co-op Live Arena, and its bringing plenty of heavy hitters to the Octagon for a stacked UFC 304 card. In the main event, Birminghams Leon Edwards defends his welterweight title for the third time against an old rival in Belal Muhammad, who brings a 10-fight unbeaten streak into this long awaited rematch. Plus, interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall will also meet an old foe, as Manchesters own defends his belt against the only man to defeat him in the Octagon,Curtis Blaydes.
